channel.title: About on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in About on Pantrypoints

item.title: Supereconomics
item.description: Pantrypoints arose from Juan’s personal research on the 2008 Financial Crisis which led to the 2008 Food Crisis, 2011 Arab Spring, and the Eurozone crisis. The 2008 Financial Crisis arose from Allan Greenspan not doing his job of regulating the banking industry, citing Adam Smith who advocated non-regulation. So Adam Smith should be such an evil guy for causing so much trouble, right? By going through Adam Smith’s works, we saw that he actually advocated the strict regulation of banking, comparing it to the building of firewalls to prevent the spread of fire .
